institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 24 (Use of Program Development Costs, etc.)
contents: Article 24 (Use of Program Development Costs, etc.) For joint training centers, expenses related to program development costs, etc. subsidized in accordance with Annex 1 of the Regulations, “Contents of Support for Joint Training Centers,” shall be in accordance with Annex 1 of the Rules, “Detailed Standards for Support to Joint Training Centers, etc.” 」, it must be used for purposes directly related to the consortium business.
